testcase.classname: Feature to test registration functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC1- User could register with valid data

testcase.classname: Feature to test login functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC2- User could log in with valid email and password

testcase.classname: Feature to test password recover functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC3- User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user choose forget password...........................................passed When fill email and click recovery button...................................passed Then Confirmation message should appear.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test search functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC4- Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given login to web application..............................................passed When search for product.....................................................passed Then results should appear correctly........................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Change Currency functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC5- Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given login to an application...............................................passed When change current currency to another.....................................passed Then currency should change correctly.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Hover and Select Product functionality in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC6- Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given login to Application..................................................passed When Hover over any category and select subcategory.........................passed Then sub category page should appear correctly..............................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test filter Products with color functionality in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC7- Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given login to nop application..............................................passed When select subcategory and filter with specific color......................passed Then filtered results should appear correctly...............................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test select different tags in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC8- Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given login to application..................................................passed When select hover Computers categories and select Notebooks sub category....passed Then Notebooks page should start correctly..................................passed And select hover Apparel categories and select Shoes sub category...........passed Then Shoes page should appear correctly.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test add different products to shopping card in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC9- Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given login correctly.......................................................passed When add one product from Notebooks in computer category to shopping card...passed And add one product from Shoes in Apparel category to shopping card.........passed Then the selected two products should added and appear correctly in shopping card.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test add different products to White List in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC10- Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given login correctly to app................................................passed When add one product from Notebooks in computer category to Wish List.......passed And add one product from Shoes in Apparel category to Wish List.............passed Then the selected two products should added correctly.......................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test add different products to Compare List in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC11- Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given login Successfully....................................................passed When add one product from Notebooks in computer category to Compare List....passed And add one product from Shoes in Apparel category to Compare List..........passed Then the selected two products should added and appear correctly............passed

testcase.classname: Feature to Create Successful Order in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC12- Create successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given login Successfully to Application.....................................passed When click go to card button and complete checkout..........................passed Then order should be created successfully...................................passed
